item.title: Palsay add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Trees are poems the earth writes upon the sky, We fell them down and turn them into paper, That we may record our emptiness." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Palsay add a quote by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
item.description: "Neither a lofty degree of intelligence nor imagination nor both together go to the making of genius. Love, love, love, that is the soul of genius." -- Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

item.title: Palsay add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Palsay add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Tell your heart that the fear of suffering is worse than the suffering itself. And that no heart has ever suffered when it goes in search of its dreams, because every second of the search is a second's encounter with God and with eternity." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Palsay add a quote by Syaikh Salman Fahd Audah dalam Conspiracy oleh Muhammad Najib, hal. 241
item.description: "Jika bukan karena nyala api yang membakarnya, aroma harum kayu gahru takkan ada yang tahu. " -- Syaikh Salman Fahd Audah dalam Conspiracy oleh Muhammad Najib, hal. 241

item.title: Palsay add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
Palsay add a quote by Avianti Armand
item.description: "aku mencintaimu. dan itu ternyata menyakitkan. kamu tidak tahu betapa setiap kali kamu berpaling, aku sangat menderita. aku seperti orang yang sedang menoreh nadi dan meneteskan darah perlahan-lahan. semakin lama aku jadi semakin lemah hingga darah habis terkuras. karena itu aku pergiâ€¦ aku harus menjauh darimu." -- Avianti Armand
